trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There was one other sighting in Atlanta on or around January 6th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailslooked out back window, saw an object with very bright light come toward me, it moved my my house as it came over it dropped to almost tree top level. my husband also saw it. no sound, very bright lights around it and red to.we both noticed no noise.about the size of a van. metal looking.it moved and then dropped down.i was excited.
